snippet.title: "SUCCESS IN SPORTS IS 90% MENTAL!"- BEYOND THE BALL EP. 3
snippet.description:
"SUCCESS IN SPORTS IS 90% MENTAL!" 

Over my career in the Sports business I've often been intrigued by the mental aspect of athletic success. I've read books and studied on the correlation between sports & psychology and identified the direct link between the greatest coaches in history and their attentiveness to the mental/emotional well being of their athletes. One of the greatest to ever coach; Phil Jackson, has NBA Championships as a coach and 2 as a player and has focused heavily on the mental side of the game. He has coached 2 of the greatest of all time, and orchestrated 3 "Three-Peats!" 

My intrigue into the mental aspect of athletics led me to visit with David McCullar, Founder of Inception, "The First Mental Heath Gym" and take a tour of his amazing facility! In Episode 3 of "Beyond The Ball" I learned David's vision, his mission, and most importantly HIS "WHY?!?"
Learn more about Inception Here:  www.inceptionep.com

#FreeGame #GoFURTHER 🎈🏁

*Like, Share & Subscribe* 
 
Twitter: @justinwbrantley / @TheBMethod
Instagram: @mr_jwbrantley
Email: justin@thebrantleymethod.com 

Special thanks to our Manager/Executive Producer Amber Boone, we appreciate all that you do! 🎥🔥🔥 

https://www.instagram.com/thirtyflirtynthrivingab
